actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide an authorization for an ex gratia payment to the people of Bikini Atoll, in the Marshall Islands of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $2,270,000 to the Secretary of the Interior to be paid to a trustee selected by the Kili/Bikini Council and approved by the High Commissioner of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to be held in trust for the use and benefit of and distribution to persons who possess rights in Bikini Atoll.

titles.title: A bill to provide an authorization for an ex gratia payment to the people of Bikini Atoll, in the Marshall Islands of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
